column3: Traffic Alert Due to Structure Fire:
column4: Outbound Russell Cave Rd between Burgess Ave and Radcliffe Rd
column5: Multiple Fire units on scene.  All outbound lanes are shut down until further notice.

column3: Traffic Alert Due to Downed Electrical Wires:
column4: N Broadway between W Fourth St and W Fifth St
column5: The roadway is shut down in both directions until further notice.

column4: Outbound Nicholasville Rd near Cherokee Park
column5: The outbound lane is shut down.  Traffic diverted to the turn lane.

column3: General Traffic Advisory Due to High Water:
column4: High water is being reported in various areas of Lexington.  Use added caution during the morning commute.  Some roadways may not be passable.
In effect until 7:30 a.m. for Lexington.
In effect until 8:15 a.m. for Richmond, Berea, and Lancaster.
